product.name: Wireless Smart Spy USB Charger Small 1080P WiFi Camera Hidden Indoor Security Camera Baby Monitor Surveillance Security Cam Motion Detection with App Live Feed
product.bullet_points:
• 【Smart Camera 】 This is an upgraded 2-in-1 smart charger, which can meet your charging or shooting needs. Not only can it charge your portable devices ( Android/ iOS ), but also can record continuous video at the same time for safety.
• 【1080P FHD Image & Wide Angle】 This camera is equipped with 1920*1080 megapixels and wide 90° degree angle lens, which presents more details and produces clear image quality. You can also customize the timestamp in the video and choose whether to display the time or change the current recording time.
• 【Motion Detection & Continuous Recording】 This home wifi cameras have built-in motion sensor, when motion is detected, the camera will automatically start recording, alert notifications will be sent to your phone;this mode will save more space on the memory card (note: the sensing distance is within 3 meters).This wireless camera also supports 24/7 loop recording all the time.
• 【LONG DISTANCE WIFI CAMERA】- being able to view and control your wifi camera from your smartphone or mobile device means that you don't have to be sitting in front of a computer to see what is happening in your home or at your business. You can view the action while having lunch, from your car or anywhere you are!
• 【Easy Setup & Use】 – No complex wiring or Wi-Fi needed. Just plug in the power, and the camera starts recording. Even without Wi-Fi, it still works with an SD card (sold separately).
features: 【Smart Camera 】 This is an upgraded 2-in-1 smart charger, which can meet your charging or shooting needs. Not only can it charge your portable devices ( Android/ iOS ), but also can record continuous video at the same time for safety.

【1080P FHD Image & Wide Angle】 This camera is equipped with 1920*1080 megapixels and wide 90° degree angle lens, which presents more details and produces clear image quality. You can also customize the timestamp in the video and choose whether to display the time or change the current recording time.

【Motion Detection & Continuous Recording】 This home wifi cameras have built-in motion sensor, when motion is detected, the camera will automatically start recording, alert notifications will be sent to your phone;this mode will save more space on the memory card (note: the sensing distance is within 3 meters).This wireless camera also supports 24/7 loop recording all the time.

【LONG DISTANCE WIFI CAMERA】- being able to view and control your wifi camera from your smartphone or mobile device means that you don't have to be sitting in front of a computer to see what is happening in your home or at your business. You can view the action while having lunch, from your car or anywhere you are!
【Easy Setup & Use】 – No complex wiring or Wi-Fi needed. Just plug in the power, and the camera starts recording. Even without Wi-Fi, it still works with an SD card (sold separately).
